The meeting will take place at night when the moon is high in the sky, as indicated by Brian Magee's message: "The time we will meet is when the moon is high."

Meeting Location:
The meeting will be held at a train station or railway depot, as specified by Peter Montgomery's message: "We will rendezvous where the trains are supplied."

In summary, the clandestine meeting will occur at night when the moon is high, at a train station or railway depot. I am required to bring a quiet way to open locked doors, such as a lock pick set or a key.

Please let me know if you need any further assistance or have additional questions.
